**VPS sale:**

Plans and details: https://www.mikrovps.hu/eu/vps/openvz

**cPanel**:

- Max 100k files cPanel hosting: 12 € / year

More information: https://www.mikrovps.hu/eu/hosting/cpanel#hu

Reseller plans: https://www.mikrovps.hu/eu/resellers/cpanel


Technical details:
- HP servers
- Native IPv6
- [We are RIPE members](https://www.ripe.net/membership/indices/data/hu.mikrovps.html)

- [TOS](https://www.mikrovps.hu/eu/gtc)
- Credit Card, Bitcion, PayPal are accepted!
- DMCA ignored, however this not mean you can host anything here! [Please ask support if you have questions!](https://my.mikrovps.hu/contact.php?language=English)
